parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 1-based line index at which to edit or insert text

parameters.name: Overwrite
parameters.description: True to overwrite the text at Index; false to insert a new line at Index

title: IGtol.SetBelowFrameTextAt
description: Edits or inserts a text line at the specified below frame line index of this GTol.
signature:
System.Boolean SetBelowFrameTextAt( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.String
Text
,
   System.Boolean
Overwrite
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: 1-based line index at which to edit or insert text

parameters.name: Overwrite
parameters.description: True to overwrite the text at Index; false to insert a new line at Index

returns: True if the text is successfully edited or inserted, false if not
